sqlMap.select: SELECT CFP.CUSTOMERID ,CFP.CUSTOMERCODE ,CFP.FGID ,CFP.FGNO ,CFP.FGNAME ,CFP.PARTID ,CFP.PARTNO ,CFP.PARTNAME ,PW.WIPORDER ,PW.WIP ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),PW.WIPORDER) +'.'+ PW.WIP As process ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),PW.WIPORDER) +'.'+ case when PW.remark is null then '' else PW.remark end AS remark ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),PW.WIPORDER)+'.'+ CASE WHEN ( PW.ISCALC = 1 ) THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END As wipCalc ,PW.ISCALC FROM V_CUST_FG_PART CFP LEFT JOIN M_PART_WIP PW ON CFP.PARTID = PW.PARTID WHERE CFP.CUSTOMERID = #customerId# CFP.FGNO LIKE '%' +#fgNo#+ '%' CFP.FGNAME LIKE '%' +#fgName#+ '%' CFP.PARTNO LIKE '%' +#partNo#+ '%' CFP.PARTNAME LIKE '%' +#partName#+ '%' ORDER BY CFP.CUSTOMERCODE,CFP.FGNO,CFP.PARTNO,PW.WIPORDER

SELECT CFP.CUSTOMERID ,CFP.CUSTOMERCODE ,CFP.FGID ,CFP.FGNO ,CFP.FGNAME ,CFP.PARTID ,CFP.PARTNO ,CFP.PARTNAME ,PW.WIPORDER ,PW.WIP ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),PW.WIPORDER) +'.'+ PW.WIP As process ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),PW.WIPORDER) +'.'+ case when PW.remark is null then '' else PW.remark end AS remark ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),PW.WIPORDER)+'.'+ CASE WHEN ( PW.ISCALC = 1 ) THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END As wipCalc ,PW.ISCALC FROM V_CUST_FG_PART CFP LEFT JOIN M_PART_WIP PW ON CFP.PARTID = PW.PARTID WHERE 1=1 CFP.FGNO LIKE '%' +#fgNo#+ '%' CFP.FGNAME LIKE '%' +#fgName#+ '%' CFP.PARTNO LIKE '%' +#partNo#+ '%' CFP.PARTNAME LIKE '%' +#partName#+ '%' ORDER BY CFP.CUSTOMERCODE,CFP.FGNO,CFP.PARTNO,PW.WIPORDER

SELECT PW.PARTID ,PW.WIP ,PW.WIPORDER ,WIP.WIP+':'+WIP.WIPNAME As PROCESS ,PW.remark AS remark ,PW.ISCALC ,WIP.CREATEDATE ,WIP.LASTUPDATE FROM M_PART_WIP PW INNER JOIN M_PART PART ON PART.PARTID = PW.PARTID INNER JOIN M_WIP WIP ON WIP.WIP = PW.WIP WHERE PW.PARTID = #partId# ORDER BY PW.WIPORDER
SELECT WIP ,WIPNAME ,WIPTYPE ,WIP+':'+WIPNAME As PROCESS ,ISCALC ,REMARK ,CREATEDATE ,CREATEBY ,LASTUPDATE ,UPDATEBY FROM M_WIP ORDER BY WIP

SELECT CUS.CUSTOMERID ,CUS.CUSTOMERCODE ,FG.FGID ,FG.FGNO ,FG.FGNAME ,PART.PARTID ,PART.PARTNO ,PART.PARTNAME FROM M_FG_PART FGP INNER JOIN M_PART PART ON PART.PARTID = FGP.PARTID INNER JOIN M_FG FG ON FG.FGID = FGP.FGID INNER JOIN M_FG_CUSTOMER FGC ON FGC.FGID = FGP.FGID INNER JOIN M_CUSTOMER CUS ON CUS.CUSTOMERID = FGC.CUSTOMERID WHERE FGC.CUSTOMERID = #customerId# FG.FGNO LIKE #fgNo#+ '%' FG.FGNAME LIKE #fgName#+ '%' PART.PARTNO LIKE #partNo#+ '%' PART.PARTNAME LIKE #partName#+ '%' PART.PARTID != #partId# ORDER BY FG.FGNO,PART.PARTNO

SELECT CUS.CUSTOMERID ,CUS.CUSTOMERCODE ,FG.FGID ,FG.FGNO ,FG.FGNAME ,PART.PARTID ,PART.PARTNO ,PART.PARTNAME ,PW.WIPORDER ,PW.WIP ,PW.remark ,CASE WHEN ( PW.ISCALC = 1 ) THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END As isCalc FROM M_FG_PART FGP INNER JOIN M_PART PART ON PART.PARTID = FGP.PARTID INNER JOIN M_FG FG ON FG.FGID = FGP.FGID INNER JOIN M_FG_CUSTOMER FGC ON FGC.FGID = FGP.FGID INNER JOIN M_CUSTOMER CUS ON CUS.CUSTOMERID = FGC.CUSTOMERID LEFT JOIN M_PART_WIP PW ON FGP.PARTID = PW.PARTID WHERE FGC.CUSTOMERID = #customerId# FG.FGNO LIKE '%' +#searchfgNo#+ '%' FG.FGNAME LIKE '%' +#searchfgName#+ '%' PART.PARTNO LIKE '%' +#searchpartNo#+ '%' PART.PARTNAME LIKE '%' +#searchpartName#+ '%' CUS.CUSTOMERCODE LIKE '%' +#customerCode#+ '%' FG.FGNO LIKE '%' +#fgNo#+ '%' FG.FGNAME LIKE '%' +#fgName#+ '%' PART.PARTNO LIKE '%' +#partNo#+ '%' PART.PARTNAME LIKE '%' +#partName#+ '%' CAST(PW.WIPORDER AS VARCHAR(3))+'. '+ PW.WIP like '%' +#wip#+ '%' CAST(PW.WIPORDER AS VARCHAR(3))+'. '+ CAST(PW.WIPORDER AS VARCHAR(3)) like '%' +#isCalc#+ '%' ORDER BY FG.FGNO,PART.PARTNO,PW.WIPORDER

SELECT CUS.CUSTOMERID ,CUS.CUSTOMERCODE ,FG.FGID ,FG.FGNO ,FG.FGNAME ,PART.PARTID ,PART.PARTNO ,PART.PARTNAME ,PW.WIPORDER ,PW.WIP ,PW.remark ,CASE WHEN ( PW.ISCALC = 1 ) THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END As isCalc FROM M_FG_PART FGP INNER JOIN M_PART PART ON PART.PARTID = FGP.PARTID INNER JOIN M_FG FG ON FG.FGID = FGP.FGID INNER JOIN M_FG_CUSTOMER FGC ON FGC.FGID = FGP.FGID INNER JOIN M_CUSTOMER CUS ON CUS.CUSTOMERID = FGC.CUSTOMERID LEFT JOIN M_PART_WIP PW ON FGP.PARTID = PW.PARTID WHERE 1=1 FG.FGNO LIKE '%' +#searchfgNo#+ '%' FG.FGNAME LIKE '%' +#searchfgName#+ '%' PART.PARTNO LIKE '%' +#searchpartNo#+ '%' PART.PARTNAME LIKE '%' +#searchpartName#+ '%' CUS.CUSTOMERCODE LIKE '%' +#customerCode#+ '%' FG.FGNO LIKE '%' +#fgNo#+ '%' FG.FGNAME LIKE '%' +#fgName#+ '%' PART.PARTNO LIKE '%' +#partNo#+ '%' PART.PARTNAME LIKE '%' +#partName#+ '%' CAST(PW.WIPORDER AS VARCHAR(3))+'. '+ PW.WIP like '%' +#wip#+ '%' CAST(PW.WIPORDER AS VARCHAR(3))+'. '+ CAST(PW.WIPORDER AS VARCHAR(3)) like '%' +#isCalc#+ '%' ORDER BY FG.FGNO,PART.PARTNO,PW.WIPORDER
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO M_PART_WIP (PARTID,WIPORDER,WIP,remark,ISCALC) SELECT #destinationPartId#,PW.WIPORDER,PW.WIP,PW.remark,PW.ISCALC FROM M_PART_WIP PW WHERE PW.PARTID = #partId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT CUSTOMERID ,CUSTOMERCODE ,FGID ,FGNO ,FGNAME ,PARTID ,PARTNO ,PARTNAME FROM v_cust_fg_part WHERE customerid = #customerId# AND fg_isenable = 1 AND part_isenable = 1 ORDER BY FGNO,PARTNO
